articles.content: How massive is the Milky Way? It's an easy question to ask, but a difficult one to answer. Imagine a single cell in your body trying to determine your total mass, and you get an idea of how difficult… [+2760 chars]

articles.title: NASA Internship Programs - NASA
articles.description: NASA offers paid internships that provide an opportunity for high school and college-level students to contribute to agency projects.
